sentences.en: Ask the manager to certify this check.
sentences.cn: 请银行经理来确认这张支票.

sentences.en: BSI certify and test full range of lift safety components.
sentences.cn: BSI认证和测试各种升降机的安全部件.

sentences.en: By submitting this form, I certify that all information is accurate.
sentences.cn: 提交这份表格, 我保证所有信息都是正确的.

sentences.en: Can you certify for his ability as a teacher?
sentences.cn: 你可以保证他能胜任老师的工作 吗 ?

sentences.en: Certify and recertify operators according to specifications.
sentences.cn: 按照要求认证以及重新认证员工.

sentences.en: Could you clarify me to certify your age?
sentences.cn: 可否出示能证下一年纪的文档?

sentences.en: Draw up unit worldwide EMI & EMS certify & standards introduce and approval.
sentences.cn: 产品EMI电磁干扰 & EMS电磁 耐受度各国认证规划与法规介绍.

sentences.en: I certify on my honour that he is innocent.
sentences.cn: 我用人格担保他是清白无辜的.

sentences.en: I certify on my honour that she is innocent.
sentences.cn: 我用人格担保她是清白无辜的.

sentences.en: I certify that the above provided information is true and accurate.
sentences.cn: 本人申明:上述提供的资料是真实和准确的.

sentences.en: I have carefully reviewed the above information and certify that are correct and complete.
sentences.cn: 以上资料业由本人填写,且经详细检查,在此保证正确无误.

sentences.en: I hearby certify theand validity of provided information.
sentences.cn: 我保证所填写的所有信息真实有效.

sentences.en: She was certified as a teacher in 1990.
sentences.cn: 她于1990年获得教师资格证书。

sentences.en: The accounts were certified by an auditor.
sentences.cn: 这些账目经审计员核实过。

sentences.en: The park's staff helps visitor to identify and certify diamonds.
sentences.cn: 公园的工作人员会帮助游客鉴别和验证钻石.

sentences.en: We can certify for him competence as an editor.
sentences.cn: 我们可以保证他能胜任编辑工作.

sentences.en: We can certify for his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我们可以保证他的诚实.

words.tran_cn: 可证明的；可确认的；可保证的
具有证明文件的；立有证据的；业经证明的
被证明的；有保证的；具有证明文件的
证明，证实；颁发合格证书（certify的过去分词形式）
发给证明书；以证书形式授权给…；用证书批准

trans.tran_en: to state that something is correct or true, especially after some kind of test

trans.tran_cn: 证明， 证实； 发证书给
trans.tran_en: to state that something is correct or true, especially after some kind of test
